name: Baldi but... Is in 2D!
description:
its Baldi basics in education and learning but Baldi accidentally switched the dimensions and now you have to play hide and seek in 2D!. Use the original controls and the 1 2 3 + - to Cheat "No cheating in the halls!"

of course is a demo but you can try it if you want

that all enjoy the demo goodbye!
